name: Kill The Topulus
description:
Kill The Topulus is the video game that the voyager plays while waiting to be able to leave on his journey, now you can kill some Topulus too, but be careful, they will insult you and laugh at you!


Grab your trusty laser pistol and get ready to defeat these giant humanoid rats who teleport in an instant to try and knock you out.
Shoot with timing and precision, as every second counts. React instantly and fire before the Topulus can hit you.


Traverse challenging levels, each with its own set of unique challenges. Engage in the frenetic pace of the gameplay and perfect your laser gun handling skills.


The real heart of the game lies in the subchallenges of the levels, like finishing a level within a certain time, avoiding healing or checkpoints, after beating the game once you unlock the ability to play each level individually and prove that you are a master of the Topulus!
